name: Calculation
description:
Calculation is a puzzle game about building logical machines. Start with a few logical symbols and rules and then build your way up to fiendishly complex mathematical machines.

The enemy blockade has cut off the port and the people of your city are starving. A pirate queen and newly-made admiral has given you an important task-- defeat the enemy code and break the blockade.

Calculation features 19 puzzles with no written rules. You must learn the language of the strange symbols to accomplish your task.

While I consider the game to be complete, if enough people are interested, I will expand it into a longer and more varied game.

[There is a Linux version, but I have not actually tested it. YMMV]

  • Programming and art by Robert Prehn
  • Background music is "Torpor" by Benjamin Burnes
  • Sound effects are from "Massamolla" by Giuseppe Caiazzo
